/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on either side. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of connections against the sky. Trees line the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that play across the scene.
